moves.name: Avatar State
moves.description: Aang enters the Avatar State, becoming extremely powerful

moves.name: Tornado Whirl
moves.description: Aang spins a dazzling whirlwind at his opponent

moves.name: Dolphin Spray
moves.description: Aang showers his opponent with a strong burst of water

characters.name: Princess Yue
characters.description: daughter of Chief Arnook, literally the moon, Sokka's first girlfriend

moves.name: Moon Beam
moves.description: Princess Yue shines a smile at her opponent so bright that her opponent loses their vision for a minute

moves.name: Water Balance
moves.description: Princess Yue extracts water from the atmosphere and shoots it at her opponent

moves.name: Moon Breeze
moves.description: Princess Yue blows a cold wind that chills and blows away her opponents

moves.name: Cold Dagger
moves.description: Princess Yue uses a family heirloom dagger to slash at her opponent

new moves.name: Water Balance
new moves.description: Aang extracts water from the atmosphere and shoots it at his opponent
